amendment.description: To improve employment opportunities for veterans by requiring the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to determine whether occupations at the Administration relating to unmanned aircraft systems technology and regulations can be incorporated into the Veterans Employment Program of the Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3495 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3495 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1785; text: CR S1785) To improve employment opportunities for veterans by requiring the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to determine whether occupations at the Administration relating to unmanned aircraft systems technology and regulations can be incorporated into the Veterans Employment Program of the Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3495 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3495 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 3464.
